TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AdvancedFilters extends System.Object

summary.span: 這個類別會提供特定屬性的寫入權限，讓使用者可以修改「虛擬」主體物件的唯讀屬性，該物件會在使用[依例查詢](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/84ac40bb-04c4-4d0b-adaf-0ddb9253599e)時傳遞至 物件。

span.span: This class provides writable access to certain attributes so that users can modify read-only properties of the "dummy" principal object that is passed to a object when using [Query By Example](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/84ac40bb-04c4-4d0b-adaf-0ddb9253599e).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別從存取物件透過屬性，並有效地視為屬性物件，並且不想要在本身使用。The class is accessed from a object through the property, and is effectually treated like a property of the object, and isn't intended to be used on its own. ## Examples 請參閱[查詢 By Example](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/84ac40bb-04c4-4d0b-adaf-0ddb9253599e)主題，例如程式碼。See the [Query By Example](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/84ac40bb-04c4-4d0b-adaf-0ddb9253599e) topic for example code.

Protected Friend Sub New (p As Principal)
protected public: AdvancedFilters(System::DirectoryServices::AccountManagement::Principal ^ p);

span.span: A object.
Instantiates a new object.
Not intended to be called directly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式應該存取透過使用者物件的屬性。Applications should access through the property of the user object.
